## writeFileLines() function

Read utf-8 file and transform to standard new lines.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function writeFileLines(path: string, lines: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | file path |
|  lines | <code>string[]</code> | lines to write |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
